TABLE.NAME: tool_customlang
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains the working checkout of all strings and their customization

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: The code of the language this string belongs to. Like en, cs or es

FIELD.NAME: master
FIELD.COMMENT: Master translation of the string as is distributed in the official lang pack, null if not translated

FIELD.NAME: local
FIELD.COMMENT: Local customization of the string, null if not customized

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the original or master was recently modified

FIELD.NAME: timecustomized
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of when the value of the local translation was recently modified, null if not customized yet

FIELD.NAME: outdated
FIELD.COMMENT: Either the English original or the master translation changed and the customization may be outdated

FIELD.NAME: modified
FIELD.COMMENT: Has the string been modified via the translator?

INDEX.NAME: uq_lang_component_string
INDEX.COMMENT: For a given language and component, string identifiers must be unique

TABLE.NAME: tool_customlang_components
TABLE.COMMENT: Contains the list of all installed plugins that provide their own language pack

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The normalized name of the plugin

FIELD.NAME: version
FIELD.COMMENT: The checked out version of the plugin, null if the version is unknown
